attributes.action: Reverse the decision to handover sovereignty of Chagos Island
attributes.background: Renegotiate the terms of the extension treaty to a favourable position for the UK which avoids paying huge sums of money to Mauritius

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: 

Review decision to cede sovereignty of the Chagos Islands to Mauritius
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702712
